mapper.select: CREATE TABLE `hrfi_openticket` ( `order_id` BIGINT (20) NOT NULL , `order_legalman` MEDIUMINT (8) , `invoice_legalman` MEDIUMINT (8) , `final_amount` DECIMAL (20, 3), `store_id` BIGINT (20) , `createtime` INT (10), PRIMARY KEY (`order_id`) ) ENGINE = INNODB DEFAULT CHARSET = utf8;
INSERT INTO hrfi_openticket SELECT order_id, order_legalman, invoice_legalman, final_amount, store_id, createtime FROM sdb_b2c_orders
SELECT order_legalman AS company_id, invoice_legalman AS open_ticket_rise FROM hrfi_openticket GROUP BY invoice_legalman
